item.title: Configfile

item.title: Syscall
item.description: api , system call System calls can be grouped roughly into six major categories:[12] Process control • create process (for example, fork on Unix-like systems, or NtCreateProcess in the Windows NT Native API) • terminate process • load, execute •

item.title: Memory
item.description: 二进制文件 与 进程内存的对应关系 linux下 ELF格式为例: bit HEX=4bit byte=8bit word=16bit , double word=32bit long=32bit long long=64bit application

item.title: Linux
